Uses of Interface
com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.inmemdb.Database

  • Packages that use Database 
    Package Description
    com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.inmemdb
    This package contains the interfaces for the databases and loaders.
    com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.inmemdb.db
    This package and its sub-packages contains the classes that implement database descriptors.
    com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.inmemdb.db.derby
    This package contains the classes that implement the support for Apache Derby.
    com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.inmemdb.db.h2
    This package contains the classes that implement the support for H2.
    com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.inmemdb.db.hsqldb
    This package contains the classes that implement the support for HSQLDB.
    com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.inmemdb.ldr.dbunit
    This package contains the classes that implement the loaders for DBUnit data sets.
    com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.inmemdb.ldr.sqltool
    This package contains the classes that implement the loaders for DDL/DML scripts.

    • Uses of Database in com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.inmemdb

      Subinterfaces of Database in com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.inmemdb 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  SQLDatabase
      Describes the operations that are used by the Mojos to launch in-memory databases, load data into, execute scripts against or shutdown the database.
      Methods in com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.inmemdb with parameters of type Database 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Loader.load(com.btmatthews.utils.monitor.Logger logger, Database database, Source source)
      Load data into or execute a script against the in-memory database.

    • Uses of Database in com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.inmemdb.db

      Classes in com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.inmemdb.db that implement Database 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractDatabase
      Abstract base classes for database objects providing an implementation of the load(com.btmatthews.utils.monitor.Logger, com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.inmemdb.Source) operation that is used to load data into or execute scripts against the database.
      class  AbstractSQLDatabase
      Abstract base classes embedded SQL databases.

    • Uses of Database in com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.inmemdb.db.derby

      Classes in com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.inmemdb.db.derby that implement Database 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DerbyDatabase
      Implements support for in-memory Apache Derby databases.

    • Uses of Database in com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.inmemdb.db.hsqldb

    • Uses of Database in com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.inmemdb.ldr.dbunit

      void AbstractDBUnitLoader.load(com.btmatthews.utils.monitor.Logger logger, Database database, Source source)

    • Uses of Database in com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.inmemdb.ldr.sqltool
